```{r}
refrigirator <- list(
  drinkS = c("麒麟","虎牌","雪山","金牌"),
  fruit = c("蘋果","番茄","鳳梨"),
  vegetable = c("小白菜","高麗菜","菠菜","空心菜")
)
refrigirator

refrigirator[[1]]
refrigirator[["vegetable"]]
```

若只想取麒麟出來
```{r}
refrigirator[[1]][[1]]
refrigirator[["drinkS"]][[1]]
```
